verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> on Neginoth <WH5058>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>, when the Ziphims <WH2130> came <WH935> <WH8800> and said <WH559> <WH8799> to Saul <WH7586>, Doth not David <WH1732> hide <WH5641> <WH8693> himself with us? Save <WH3467> <WH8685> me, O 'Elohim <WH430>, by thy name <WH8034>, and judge <WH1777> <WH8799> me by thy strength <WH1369>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my prayer <WH8605>, O 'Elohim <WH430>; give ear <WH238> <WH8685> to the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>.

For strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> are risen up <WH6965> <WH8804> against me, and oppressors <WH6184> seek <WH1245> <WH8765> after my soul <WH5315>: they have not set <WH7760> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH430> before them. Selah <WH5542>.
Behold, 'Elohim <WH430> is mine helper <WH5826> <WH8802>: the YY <WH136> is with them that uphold <WH5564> <WH8802> my soul <WH5315>.
He shall reward <WH7725> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH7725> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> unto mine enemies <WH8324> <WH8802>: cut them off <WH6789> <WH8685> in thy truth <WH571>.
I will freely <WH5071> sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> unto thee: I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thy name <WH8034>, O YY <WH3068>; for it is good <WH2896>.
For he hath delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> me out of all trouble <WH6869>: and mine eye <WH5869> hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> his desire upon mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.
